I change a little in org.archive.crawler.writer.ARCWriterProcessor and can
let user to add some ContentType string. only the content-type list in the
user defined values will be save to hard disk. When turn on expert setting,will find
some property under ARCWriter setting. Don't set this value means accept
all pages.

Because I can't access the cvs server now,so post the whole file here.
It was made on version 1.17

ansi

>> I think should change the code to:
>> 
>>         String ct = curi.getContentType();
>>         if (ct == null || !ct.startwith("text/"))
>
>For my purposes I only want markup. In a crawl I recently did that
>resulted in over 960,000 documents, just under 14,000 (1.5%) were
>text/plain, and most of these were robots.txt or similar noise that
>was of little interest. The remaining text/* types amounted to much
>less than this.
